content: Have used for a year and can learn more. Have time.
We have a nice intro video to support your learning. https://youtu.be/cA32MMsN61g and if you want to minimize the overwhelm there is this one https://youtu.be/cA32MMsN61g

Well...I have posted everywhere I have been instructed for more than two weeks...I can't get the answer to o my question. It doesn't feel good to be shuffled from one channel to the next.

Qu. How do I set up a fundraiser at a watch party?

Thanks so much!

<@1268700656743612417>  the <#1245826306780823563> channel would be a good place to ask questions like this. Here's a link to a similar question another member posted earlier today: https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1245826306780823563/1277816160884232214
<@1276944250491113656> I can host, but the second g part of my question seems to be more challenging.
Hi <@1268700656743612417> due to campaign law we only promote DNC and HFP official fundraising events.
There are apps like eventbrite that will manage your own personal fundraising.

<@568257600228032512> ho Carolyn, what is DNV and HFP?

I would like to have it all go straight to the campaign and pur group be recognized for organizing the donations.

Democratic National Campaign
Harris For President
also Harris Victory Fund
Wouldn't that be the Harris for president link?
You could use this as your donation link at your event https://kamalaharris.com

<@568257600228032512> I appreciate you sharing this. How can we as ROC 4 Harris be credited with the donations that come in?

Is there a place to make a note?

Hi Dorothea! I believe you can set up your host event on https://events.democrats.org and once it's approved, it should tie to your campaign drive, giving your group credit. I would confirm this though with <@1250880260338094331> since you didn't receive an answer in the host channel.
<@957714233217409174> <@957714233217409174> ok...My event is set up already. I will reach out to her.
